update.sql: create table NoteReceiver ( id bigint not null auto_increment, note_id bigint not null, pinned bit not null, recipient bigint not null, status varchar(255) not null, recipientGroupId bigint, workspaceId bigint, primary key (id) );
alter table Note drop owner, drop status, drop pinned;
alter table Note add column multiUserNote bit not null;
update Note set multiUserNote=true where id in (select note_id from NoteReceiver group by note_id having count(note_id) > 1);
alter table note convert to character set utf8mb4 collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
